div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 598 Vîlcelele Bune, c. 27 km. SSE of Deva, Rumania, 1886 Burial: 2nd-1st cent. B.C. (T) Contents: 500+ AR. Pot hoard Apollonia, Illyria: dr. Dyrrhachium: dr. Disposition: dispersed Téglás, Erdélyi Múzeum 4 (1887), p. 145 Mitrea, ED 10 (1945), p. 88, no. 12
